Tournaments

This is a *test* of Challonge integration.

Feedback & questions ⇒ ActionFPS Discord Channel.

How to play

Do a Clan-Match game.

If it works We shall expand it to clanwars once this is verified to be working for normal games.

How it works (pseudo-code)

if game.winner and game.loser is not None:
    for every tournament in challonge.open_tournaments:
        for every match in the tournament.remaining_matches:
            if game.winner and game.loser in match.players:
                match.update(
                    winner = game.winner,
                    loser = game.loser,
                    score = "1-0"
                )
